name: Wok kylling
description: Wok with chicken and vegetables.
instructions: Cook the chicken, add vegetables, stir-fry with soy sauce, and serve.

name: Laks, salat med fetaost, blomkålris
description: Grilled salmon with feta salad and cauliflower rice.
instructions: Grill the salmon, mix salad with feta cheese, and serve with cauliflower rice.

name: Cæsarsalat
description: Caesar salad with chicken and croutons.
instructions: Mix lettuce, chicken, and dressing, then top with parmesan and croutons.

name: Bakt hvit fisk, gulrot, potet, smør
description: Baked white fish with carrots, potatoes, and butter.
instructions: Bake the fish, boil the carrots and potatoes, and serve with melted butter.

name: Lasagne, agurksalat, brød
description: Lasagna with cucumber salad and bread.
instructions: Prepare lasagna with meat sauce and cheese, bake, and serve with cucumber salad and bread.

name: Dumplings (steamed)
description: Steamed dumplings with soy sauce.
instructions: Steam the dumplings for 10-15 minutes and serve with soy sauce.

name: Ramen
description: Japanese noodle soup with broth and egg.
instructions: Cook ramen noodles in broth, add egg and vegetables, and serve hot.

name: Tiktok pasta, kylling
description: Baked feta pasta with cherry tomatoes and chicken.
instructions: Roast feta and tomatoes, mix with pasta and grilled chicken.

name: Fiskesuppe
description: Creamy fish soup with vegetables.
instructions: Cook fish in broth with vegetables, add cream, and serve hot.

name: Kremet pasta, kylling, sopp
description: Creamy pasta with chicken and mushrooms.
instructions: Sauté chicken and mushrooms, add cream, and mix with pasta.

name: Fiskeboller, hvit saus
description: Fish dumplings in white sauce.
instructions: Prepare a white sauce, add fish dumplings, and serve warm.

name: Panert fisk, ertestuing, stekt potet
description: Breaded fish with mashed peas and fried potatoes.
instructions: Bread and fry the fish, make mashed peas, and serve with fried potatoes.

name: Koteletter, ovnsstekte grønnsaker
description: Pork chops with oven-roasted vegetables.
instructions: Season the pork chops and roast with vegetables in the oven.

name: Pizza med fyll (kaldhevet)
description: Cold-fermented pizza with tomato sauce and cheese.
instructions: Prepare the dough, let it rise overnight, add toppings, and bake.

name: Laks med mangosalat og creme fraiche
description: Salmon with mango salad and crème fraîche.
instructions: Grill the salmon, prepare the mango salad, and serve with crème fraîche.

name: Linsegryte med karri og revet kylling
description: Lentil curry with shredded chicken.
instructions: Cook lentils with curry and coconut milk, then add shredded chicken.

name: Kjøttgryte med grønnsaker
description: Hearty beef stew with vegetables.
instructions: Cook beef and vegetables together until tender.

name: Hjemmelagde kjøttboller, potetmos og stekt brokkolini
description: Homemade meatballs with mashed potatoes and broccolini.
instructions: Make meatballs, cook mashed potatoes, and sauté broccolini.

name: Grillet kylling og paprika med kremostfyll
description: Grilled chicken with stuffed bell peppers.
instructions: Stuff bell peppers with cream cheese and grill with chicken.

name: Fylt paprika
description: Stuffed bell peppers with meat and rice.
instructions: Fill peppers with meat and rice, then bake.

name: Grillet kylling, waldorfsalat, stekte poteter
description: Grilled chicken with Waldorf salad and roasted potatoes.
instructions: Grill the chicken, make Waldorf salad, and roast the potatoes.

name: Baconsurra kylling med ostefyll
description: Bacon-wrapped chicken with cheese filling.
instructions: Stuff chicken with cheese, wrap in bacon, and bake.

name: Eggepizza
description: Low-carb egg-based pizza.
instructions: Make an egg base, add toppings, and bake.

name: Bakt søtpotet med grønnsaker
description: Baked sweet potato with vegetables.
instructions: Bake sweet potatoes and serve with vegetables.

name: Marry Me Chicken
description: Creamy chicken with sun-dried tomatoes.
instructions: Cook chicken in a creamy sauce with sun-dried tomatoes.
